Text: San Antonio TXLadies Your flight reservations are as follows April Flight Departing pm arriving San Antonio pm April Flight Departing pm arriving Houston pm Marie your confirmation number is ZUXCG Tana your confirmation number is ZVFGP No ground transportation has been arranged for you once you arrive San Antonio if you decide you want me to book transportation please let me know at your earliest convenience A confirmation will be mailed to you Please bring a picture ID with you to the airport Thank you for choosing Bradens Travel Service Good Day

Time for July Morning Everyone Please forward your time to me ASAP today The deadline for time entry is tomorrow August st at pm Thank you E

TimeMorning Everyone As we all know this is the first pay period in which time will be input into the SAP system I would appreciate it very much if you would send your time to me by Wednesday June th just in casethere are any problems with the new system AttorneysSpecialists if your assistant usually sends your time to me we will continue that process If you have any questions please call me Thanks in advance for your cooperation E

Time Period ending July Morning Everyone Please forward your time to me preferably via email no later than tomorrow July This is very important because I am sure there are still some glitches in the system so the sooner I input the time the better off well all be Thanks ESB

Information regarding Samantha BoydMorning Sara and Kaye The following information is what we received from Samanthas familypastor last night There will not be a wake for Taylor however there will be a viewing tomorrow Thursday March at am and funeral services will be held at am at Greater Pure Light MBC Directions from downtown are as follows Take N to Laura Koppe Take the Laura Koppe exit and make a right on Laura Koppe Take Laura Koppe to Homestead Make a left on Homestead and a quick right on Kelburn The address is Kelburn Samanthas Pastor Pastor Broussard informed us last night that due to the fact that the adoption had not been finalized Taylor was not covered by any form of insurance FYI Just in case you dont know Samanthas husbandss name is Twalure Boyd Erica S Braden Sr Administrative Assistant Enron Broadband Services Legal

Appointment of Traders and Authorization to open specific Brokerage Accounts pursuant to Bridgeline Risk Management Policy and Form of Guarantyplease find the above captioned documents for your review and comment Note that although the Bridgeline Risk Management Policy is referred to in the attachments it is NOT attached hereto It however will be attached to the final version of each of these two appointment and authorization documents I have prepared a form of Guaranty which may be used for gas purchases andor sales by Bridgeline Gas Marketing LLC and also in connection with swap and option agreements Please review these documents and call if you wish to discuss the same Since Ted Murphy of the Enron Corp Risk Control Group is out of the country for the entire week I presume that Rick Buy the Executive Vice President of this same group will execute these documents as the Chief Risk Control Officer If this is not a correct assumption I request that Vlady please let me know As we discussed Vlady can you please talk with Rick about these documents I would of course be willing to discuss these with Rick if you would like

FW I LOVE YAOriginal Message From Davis Dana Sent Wednesday October AM To Mendez Nicole Braden Erica Shanks Reginald Mary Dove Email Subject FW I LOVE YA I Love Ya Suppose one morning you never wake up do all your friends know you love them I was thinkingI could die today tomorrow or next week and I wondered if I had any wounds needing to be healed friendships that needed rekindling or three words needing to be said Sometimes I love you can heal bless Let every one of your friends know you love them Even if you think they dont love you back you would be amazed at what those three little words and a smile can do Just in case I die tomorrowI LOVE YA Send this to at least people you love and send it back to the person who sent it to you The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this email by anyone else is unauthorized If you are not the intended recipient any disclosure copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful When addressed to our clients any opinions or advice contained in this email are subject to the terms and conditions expressed in the governing KPMG client engagement letter
FW Directions to Original Message From Braden Erica Sent Monday October AM To Subject Directions to

Chicken TacosChicken Tacos pkg count skinless boneless chicken breasts pkg chicken taco seasoning Tomatillos Onion small jalapeno pepper pieces of garlic sprigs of cilantro salt and pepper to taste Toppings cheese onion tomatoes lettuce sour cream picante sauce Boil chicken in water seasonings onions and bell peppers Once done about minutes shred the chicken in a skillet In a blender add tomatillos onion jalapeno pepper garlic cilantro and cup of broth from your chicken Mix well Pour vegetable mixture in skillet with chicken and add chicken taco seasoning Mix well and let simmer for minutes over low heat Serve with tortillas and toppings Erica
